subject: p19759491
History: Fever status post pancreatic pancreas and renal transplant.
Findings: PA and lateral chest radiographs were obtained. Aeration of the lungs has improved since the last exam. Retrocardiac opacity in the left lower lobe is persistent. Severe cardiomegaly has not changed. The positions of biventricular pacing leads are stable.
Impression: Stable appearance of severe cardiomegaly and non-specific retrocardiac opacity which could represent atelectasis or infection.
